name: En Quete de Lumière
description:
En Quete de Lumière is a game developed by 2 friends (Lucas Maillet and Quentin Tran), students of the French engineering school Telecom SudParis, during the coronavirus lockdown. The goal was to make a game to gather our friends despite the quarantine.

En Quete de Lumiere is an asymetric online multiplayer game. The story takes place in a mansion where guests are invited to enjoy a dinner party. You will play one of these guests. However, one of these guests/players is a murderer! If it is you, you will have to search for information in the mansion to identify your target. At the same time, you will try to retrieve a weapon to kill this target.

If you are not the assassin, you goal is to look for clues to identify the murderer and stop it before it’s too late. To achieve this, you will have to investigate!

Game developed with Unity and Blender.
